text: Dreadnaught may refer to: * Dreadnaught (band), a heavy metal band in Melbourne, Australia * Dreadnaught (film), a 1981 film by Yuen Woo-Ping * USLS Dreadnaught, a motor lifeboat that sank during a rescue in 1913 * USS Dreadnaught (YT-34), a tug in commission from 1918 to 1922 and in non- commissioned service from 1922 to 1944 * Dreadnaught wheel, a wheel with articulated rails attached at the rim to provide a firm footing * Beyond the Frontier: Dreadnaught, a novel by Jack Campbell * "Dreadnaught", a song by Machinae Supremacy from Deus Ex Machinae ==See also== * Edward Boscawen or "Old Dreadnaught" (1711–1761), Admiral in the Royal Navy * Dreadnaught USA, an experimental rock band based in New Hampshire, US * Dreadnought (disambiguation) * HMS Dreadnought (1906), a revolutionary British battleship in terms of technology
title: Dreadnaught
